Please access "Enumerate graphs and partition" by calling `vignette(topic = "enumerate", package = "Pv3Rs")` within R.

"Enumerate graphs and partition" is a pdf vignette. 
At present, pkgdown does not support pdf vignettes; see [pkgdown issue 781](https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/781). 
When Pv3Rs is on Cran, this signpost will link to the pdf vignette on CRAN.
